Name: D Bullish Eng
Formula: (Open(0) < Open(1) and Open(0) < Close(1)) and (Close(0) > Open(1) and Close(0) > Close(1))

Name: Wk Bullish Eng
Formula: (Open(0) < Open(1) and Open(0) < Close(1)) and (Close(0) > Open(1) and Close(0) > Close(1))

Name: Mo Bullish Eng
Formula: (Open(0) < Open(1) and Open(0) < Close(1)) and (Close(0) > Open(1) and Close(0) > Close(1))

Name: D Bearish Eng
Formula: (Close(0) < Close(1) and Close(0) < Open(1)) and (Open(0) > Close(1) and Open(0) > Open(1))

Name: Wk Bearish Eng
Formula: (Close(0) < Close(1) and Close(0) < Open(1)) and (Open(0) > Close(1) and Open(0) > Open(1))

Name: Mo Bearish Eng

Name: D Hammer & Up
Formula: (((High(1) - Low(1)) > 3 * (Open(1) - Close(1)) and ((Close(1) - Low(1)) / (0.001 + High(1) - Low(1)) > 0.6) and ((Open(1) - Low(1)) / (0.001 + High(1) - Low(1)) > 0.6))) and Close(0) > High(1)

Name: D Shtng Star & Down
Formula: (((High(1) - Low(1)) > 3 * (Open(1) - Close(1)) and ((High(1) - Close(1)) / (0.001 + High(1) - Low(1)) > 0.6) and ((High(1)-Open(1)) / (0.001 + High(1) - Low(1)) > 0.6))) and Open(0) < High(1) and Close(0) < Low(1)
